notes: We count a maximum of three children when calculating the monthly contribution.

network_hospitals: Any private hospital approved by the Scheme
notes: Payment up to 200% of Discovery Health Rate for healthcare professionals with payment arrangements.

procedures.notes: Higher upfront payment if both gastroscopy and colonoscopy are performed.
procedures.marketing_description: On Classic Comprehensive, a standalone Gastroscopy in hospital attracts a co-payment of R7,250. This is designed to encourage the use of 'Doctor's Rooms' where the procedure is often fully covered.
preparation: Fast for at least 6 hours before the procedure (no food or water).
Arrangement for a driver is essential as sedation is used.
Stop blood thinners if advised by your doctor.
procedures.recovery_time: 1-2 hours in the recovery room. You can return to work the next day.

procedures.notes: Higher upfront payment if both gastroscopy and colonoscopy are performed.
procedures.marketing_description: A Colonoscopy on Classic Comprehensive has a R7,250 co-payment if performed in a hospital without being part of a care basket. Consider using an In-Rooms provider to potentially reduce costs.
preparation: Follow a low-fiber diet 2-3 days before.
Take the prescribed bowel preparation medication the day before (this will cause frequent loose stools).
Stay near a bathroom and drink clear fluids only on the day before.
procedures.recovery_time: You will be monitored until the sedative wears off. Bloating and gas are common for a few hours.

procedures.notes: No co-payment for in-room network provider.

modules.title: Essential Screening and Prevention Benefits
modules.description: Covers various screening tests at wellness providers for early detection of serious illnesses.

data.screening_for_kids: Covers assessment of child’s growth and development.
data.screening_for_adults: Includes Health Check and screenings for BMI, blood pressure, cholesterol, and HIV.
data.screening_for_seniors: Includes age-appropriate falls-risk screening assessment for members 65 years and older.

modules.title: Day-to-day Benefits
modules.description: Covers day-to-day healthcare expenses from defined benefits and accounts.

data.medical_savings_account: Covers day-to-day medical expenses from available money in MSA.
data.self_payment_gap: Period where claims are paid from own pocket until reaching Annual Threshold.
data.day_to_day_extender_benefit: Covers certain day-to-day benefits after MSA is depleted.
data.above_threshold_benefit: Covers day-to-day expenses at DHR or portion of DHR after reaching Annual Threshold.

modules.title: Chronic Benefits
modules.description: Covers treatment for a list of 27 medical conditions under the Chronic Disease List.

data.prescribed_minimum_benefit_conditions: Access to treatment for conditions under Prescribed Minimum Benefits.
data.medicine_cover_for_chronic_disease_list: Full cover for approved chronic medicine on the medicine list.
data.medicine_cover_for_additional_disease_li: Cover for medicine on the Additional Disease List.

modules.title: Oncology Care Programme
modules.description: Comprehensive cover for cancer treatment, including high-cost medicine and innovative treatment.

data.prescribed_minimum_benefits: Covers treatment costs up to the cover amount.
data.oncology_benefit: Covers approved cancer treatment over a 12-month cycle.
data.oncology_innovation_benefit: Covers innovative cancer medicine meeting Scheme’s criteria.
data.extended_oncology_benefit: Extended cover for a defined list of cancers after reaching cover limit.
data.advanced_illness_benefit: Access to comprehensive palliative care programme.

modules.title: Hospital Cover
modules.description: Unlimited hospital cover for comprehensive plans.

data.admissions_for_scopes: Covers certain amounts from day-to-day benefits for scope procedures.

modules.title: Day Surgery Network
modules.description: Cover for specific procedures in the Day Surgery Network.

data.how_we_pay: Covers services from Hospital Benefit, up to 200% of DHR for certain professionals.

modules.title: International Travel Benefit
modules.description: Covers medical emergencies when traveling outside South Africa.

data.cover_amount: Up to R5 million per person per journey
